attributes.additional_details: The Government are trying to make life harder for disabled people. Removing Incapacitaty Benefits For Under 22’s, making PIP stricter when it isn’t needed to be stricter and much more. We don’t deserve this discrimination. Disabled Deserve Better.
attributes.background: Remove the disability benefits cuts from the plans so that disabled people don’t get swept under the rug and forgotten about.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disability Benefits: Stop Changes to PIP and Universal Credit
